price: 25. Y tu Señor (¡oh, Muhammad!) las reunirá a todas. Él es, en verdad, el Sabio, el Omnisciente.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka huwa yaḥshuruhum innahu ḥakīmun ʿalīmun
